TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CodeGenerationOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies various options to use when generating .NET Framework types for use with an XML Web Service.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A Web Service Description Language (WSDL) file typically describes a class in XML schema language as an `xsd:complex` type composed of various primitive `xsd:complex` and `xsd:simple` types. When generating a .NET Framework class that represents a given `xsd:complex` type, you must choose how to represent the various primitive types it contains.
By default, each primitive is implemented as a field. If you specify the GenerateProperties option, each primitive type is instead implemented as a property.
### Ordering of Serialization Code The GenerateOrder member instructs the code generator to create the serialization code in a specific order as determined by the `Order` property of the following attributes:
- [XmlAnyElementAttribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.xml.serialization.xmlanyelementattribute\(v=vs.110\).aspx)
- [XmlArrayAttribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.xml.serialization.xmlarrayattribute\(v=vs.110\).aspx)
- [XmlElementAttribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.xml.serialization.xmlelementattribute\(v=vs.110\).aspx)
> [!NOTE] > Once the `Order` property has been set on one public property or field in a type, it must be applied to all public properties and fields for that type and all inherited types.
## Examples The following example illustrates the use of the CodeGenerationOptions enumeration to specify the behavior of a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> object.
[!code-cs[WebServices_Description_Importer#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.serializati_4_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#4](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.serializati_4_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions EnableDataBinding = int32(16)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions GenerateNewAsync = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Creates events for the asynchronous invocation of Web methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions GenerateOldAsync = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Creates Begin and End methods for the asynchronous invocation of Web methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions GenerateOrder = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Generates explicitly ordered serialization code as specified through the property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions GenerateProperties = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Represents primitive types by fields and primitive types by namespace types.
